## IRouter.back() method

回退历史记录

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
back(stepOrKey?: number | string, target?: RouteTarget, payload?: any, overflowRedirect?: string): void | Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stepOrKey | number \| string | 需要回退的步数或者历史记录的唯一id |
|  target | [RouteTarget](./react-taro.routetarget.md) | 指定要操作的路由栈，默认:<code>page</code> |
|  payload | any | 提交给 [RouteRuntime](./react-taro.routeruntime.md) 的数据 |
|  overflowRedirect | string | 如果回退溢出，跳往哪个路由。默认:[UserConfig.HomeUrl](./react-taro.userconfig.homeurl.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;
